name: Elizabeth Laraine STOVER, by her parent and natural guardian, Fred STOVER, Appellant, v. Edwin S. KREMER, M.D., Ronald Zieziula, M.D., Z.R. Skef, M.D., and Hamot Medical Center

judges: Before NIX, C.J., LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
parties: Elizabeth Laraine STOVER, by her parent and natural guardian, Fred STOVER, Appellant, v. Edwin S. KREMER, M.D., Ronald Zieziula, M.D., Z.R. Skef, M.D., and Hamot Medical Center.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: William T. Jorden, Jorden and White, Meadville, Pa., for appellant.
Will J. Schaaf, Eugene C. Sundberg, Jr., Marsh, Spaeder, Baur, Spaeder & Schaaf, Erie, Pa., for Edwin S. Kremer, M.D. and Ronald Zieziula, M.D.
T. Warren Jones, John W. Draskovic, MacDonald, Illig, Jones & Britton, Erie, Pa., for Z.R. Skef, M.D. and Hamot Medical Center.
casebody.head_matter:
564 A.2d 158
Elizabeth Laraine STOVER, by her parent and natural guardian, Fred STOVER, Appellant, v. Edwin S. KREMER, M.D., Ronald Zieziula, M.D., Z.R. Skef, M.D., and Hamot Medical Center.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 26, 1989.
Decided Oct. 6, 1989.
William T. Jorden, Jorden and White, Meadville, Pa., for appellant.
Will J. Schaaf, Eugene C. Sundberg, Jr., Marsh, Spaeder, Baur, Spaeder & Schaaf, Erie, Pa., for Edwin S. Kremer, M.D. and Ronald Zieziula, M.D.
T. Warren Jones, John W. Draskovic, MacDonald, Illig, Jones & Britton, Erie, Pa., for Z.R. Skef, M.D. and Hamot Medical Center.
Before NIX, C.J., LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
